DataSourcePortable.Name: Tile lan√ßamentos
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT DISTINCT DOCUMENTO,
 ((SELECT CASE
 WHEN SUM(VALOR) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(VALOR) END
 FROM CT_LANCAMENTOS
 WHERE NATUREZA = 'C' AND DOCUMENTO = A.DOCUMENTO
 )
 -
 (
 SELECT CASE
 WHEN SUM(VALOR) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(VALOR) END
 FROM CT_LANCAMENTOS
 WHERE NATUREZA = 'D' AND DOCUMENTO = A.DOCUMENTO
 )
 )
 DIFERENCA FROM CT_LANCAMENTOS A" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="DOCUMENTO" From="A" Path="DOCUMENTO" /> <Field Alias="DIFERENCA" From="A" Path="DIFERENCA" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
